name: portfolio-website
description: AI-focused portfolio site with a lightweight Node.js backend for contact submissions.

scripts.format: npx prettier --write index.html script.js styles.css README.md "projects/**/*.html" "server/**/*.js" package.json
scripts.format:check: npx prettier --check index.html script.js styles.css README.md "projects/**/*.html" "server/**/*.js" package.json
